Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3950 UNIVERSITY DRIVE,SUITE 301, FAIRFAX, Virginia, 22030, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Playa Hotels & Resorts NV acts as an owner, operator, and developer of all-inclusive resorts in prime beachfront locations in popular vacation destinations. The company's segments are Yucatan Peninsula, Pacific Coast, Dominican Republic, and Jamaica. It generates a majority of its revenue from the Yucatan Peninsula segment. Its brand profile consists of HYATT ZIVA, HYATT ZILARA, Hilton, JEWEL RESORTS, and others.

value.name: Greg Maliassas
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
